ReactorEE.pcomponents

Class PlantComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReactorEE.pcomponents.PlantComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Condenser, ConnectorPipe, Generator, OperatingSoftware, Pump, Reactor, Turbine, Valve

    public abstract class PlantComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    PlantComponent is an abstract class that has fields and methods that apply to most or all plant components. That allows for flexible changes to future implementations (i.e. valves/generator that break randomly).
    Author:
    Lamprey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • PlantComponent

        protected PlantComponent()
        Creates a new operational PlantComponent object with the default chance to fail and turns to repair.

      • PlantComponent

        protected PlantComponent(int failureRate,
              int repairTime,
              int maxFailureRate)
        Creates a new operational PlantComponent with the specified chance to fail and turns to repair.
        Parameters:
        failureRate - chance of a component failing randomly
        repairTime - number of steps needed to repair the component
        maxFailureRate -

      • PlantComponent

        protected PlantComponent(int failureRate,
              int repairTime,
              boolean operational,
              boolean pressurised)
        Creates a new PlantComponent with the specified chance to fail, turns to repair and working condition.
        Parameters:
        failureRate - the chance of the component to fail randomly
        repairTime - the number of steps needed to repair the component
        operational - determines whether the component is initially operational or not
        pressurised - determines whether or not the component is pressurised.

      • PlantComponent

        protected PlantComponent(int failureRate,
              int repairTime,
              boolean operational,
              boolean pressurised,
              Flow flow)
        Creates a new PlantComponent with the specified chance to fail, turns to repair and working condition.
        Parameters:
        failureRate - the chance of the component to fail randomly
        repairTime - the number of steps needed to repair the component
        operational - determines whether the component is initially operational or not
        pressurised - determines whether or not the component is pressurised.
        flow - the flow out of the component

        Returns:
        the flow object that stores the rate of flow out of this component

      • isPressurised

        public boolean isPressurised()
        Returns:
        true if the component is pressurised (i.e. Reactor or Condenser)

      • isOperational

        public boolean isOperational()
        Returns:
        true if the component is operational (working correctly)

      • setOperational

        public void setOperational(boolean operational)
        Sets the condition of the component - true if it is working correctly, false if it has failed.
        Parameters:
        operational - the new state of the component

      • updateState

        public abstract void updateState()
        Updates the information about the component.

      • checkFailure

        public boolean checkFailure()
        Runs all checks for the component and changes it's operational state if needed.

      • increaseFailureRate

        public void increaseFailureRate()
        Increases the component's chance to fail by 0.1% per call. Doesn't increase the chance to fail once MAX_FAILURE_RATE is reached.

      • setMaxFailureRate

        public void setMaxFailureRate(int maxFailureRate)
